def_en: A shoot-out is a fight in which people shoot at each other with guns.

def_cn: (足球等运动的)点球大战，罚点球决胜负
def_en: In games such as football, a shoot-out or a penalty shoot-out is a way of deciding the result of a game that has ended in a draw. Players from each team try to score a goal in turn until one player fails to score and their team loses the game.
